title: PHYSICAL COMBAT - SOUND EFFECTS
description: Make your combats so much more realistic with this Sounds! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


Update One - 16/11/2023

(New Sword Sounds Added)


By investing in this pack you automatically have access to over 350 physical combat files.


Among them, Small, large, medium swords, axes, spears, bows, weak, strong, blocked punches, shields, and several others.


It's important to note that I named the files after the visual reference when I created them, but you can use it as you see fit! For example, suddenly the sound that I named "sword" you can use for any metal weapon that fits.


All sounds are also made with several layers, you get the whole sound and they are separate, so this package can also serve for other situations that involve the sound of these weapons, like picking up a sword from the ground for example.


And it's worth remembering that by investing in this pack you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a nice price for the community! :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 366

Number of Audio Cues: 366

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
